item.title: Streaming Is Crushing Songwriters’ Livelihood — Artist House Aims to Fix That
item.description: Decades into the digital age and the music industry is still grappling with the ups and downs of a business model built on streaming. Sure, there’s plenty in the plus column. Streaming removed many ba
